About

Orchard Computer Solutions offers both data recovery and data transfer services. Both internal and external drives can be used.

Data Recovery

Do you want to get your deleted files back, or save them from a corrupted drive? Please get in touch for more information and a quote so that I can help recover your data.

Data Transfer

If you are planning on using a new system, you might want to keep all your documents, family photos, videos and your music collection from your old computer.

Alternatively, you might want to keep your files safe from harm by having backups of them on other drives so that you still have all your data in case of disaster.

Contact

Get in contact to place an order, book a consultation, or request a service. Use the form below, or send an email directly to contact@orchardcomputersolutions.co.uk
